text: Ærest of þam garan innan þa blacan hegcean.
Of þære hegcean nyþer innan þone fulan broc of ðam fulan broce wiþ westan randes æsc þanon on þæne ealdan dic wið westan þa herde wic.
Of þære dic<../images/tbar.gif>innan wealdan hrigc on eadrices gemære.
Andlang eadrices gemære<../images/tbar.gif>innan cynebellinga gemære andlang gemære<../images/tbar.gif>on icenhylte.
Andlang icenhylte oþ þone hæðenan byrgels.
Up andlang stræte on welandes stocc.
Of þam stocce nyþer andlang rah heges ðæt on heg leage of ðære leage nyþer ðæt eft on ðæne garan.
